code: import*as Location from"expo-location";var coordFetch=function coordFetch(location){return Location.geocodeAsync(location).then(function(response){return{latitude:response[0].latitude,longitude:response[0].longitude};}).catch(function(error){return alert("Wrong Address!");});};var ReverseCoordFetch=function ReverseCoordFetch(coord){return Location.reverseGeocodeAsync(coord).then(function(response){return response[0].street+", "+response[0]+", "+response[0].country;}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};export{coordFetch,ReverseCoordFetch};
